summary: An email from FBI Forensic Accountant Mark Lubin to Eric Ryan at UBS, requesting the password for a CD containing financial production related to the Ghislaine Maxwell subpoena. The email is copied to FBI Special Agent Amanda Young.

persons.name: Mark Lubin
persons.role: Forensic Accountant, FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Author of the email requesting the password for a CD containing financial production related to the Ghislaine Maxwell subpoena.

persons.name: Eric Ryan
persons.context: Recipient of the email at UBS, presumably involved in providing financial records in response to a subpoena related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Amanda Young
persons.context: Copied on the email from Mark Lubin regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell subpoena financial production.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual whose financial records are being subpoenaed, as indicated by the email's subject line.

connections.description: Lubin is contacting Ryan to obtain a password for financial data related to the Maxwell investigation.
Both are FBI personnel; Lubin copies Young on the email regarding the Maxwell subpoena.
Lubin, as an FBI forensic accountant, is involved in obtaining financial records related to Maxwell via subpoena.
Ryan, at UBS, is involved in providing financial production in response to a subpoena related to Maxwell.

events.title: Email request for subpoena data password
events.description: FBI Forensic Accountant Mark Lubin emails Eric Ryan at UBS to request the password for a CD containing financial production related to the Ghislaine Maxwell subpoena.

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza
keyFacts: The FBI was actively subpoenaing financial records related to Ghislaine Maxwell as of October 2019.
Financial institution UBS was involved in providing records (a 'financial production') to the FBI in response to a subpoena.
The records were delivered on a password-protected CD, indicating sensitive financial data.
The email demonstrates coordination between FBI forensic accounting and field agents in the Maxwell investigation.
